title: Unlookout

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Unlookout someone at night. They will become blinded, becoming unable to gain any role feedback or notifications that night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roles that can see notifications/feedback will still be able to see that. You will also learn any notifications or feedback that you hid.
- Your target learns that they were blinded.
- If your target uses a direct kill or protective ability, they will randomly target someone between their target and their target's two living neighbors.
- If a player visits your target, you will give glasses to them, giving them the attribute: `- You will learn anyone who visits your target.` This attribute does not apply the night it is given. If they are Town-aligned, this attribute only lasts for one night; it is permanent on all other alignments.
- You may unlookout the same player twice in a row.
- This is mechanically a town role in every way except win condition.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the good faction lose (may win while dead)
